inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Seated resting heart rate < 70 bpm in the absence of rate-lowering medications
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Supine blood pressure < 90/60 mmHg
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Overt cause for postural tachycardia, i.e., acute dehydration, prolonged bed rest
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of underlying structural heart disease including: Valvular disease (i.e. moderate or greater valvular stenosis or regurgitation)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Greater than mild left ventricular systolic impairment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known coronary artery disease or prior myocardial infarction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of tachyarrhythmias including: Supraventricular tachycardia, atrial tachycardia, atrial fibrillation / flutter
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Ventricular tachyarrhythmias
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing long QT interval (e.g. known congenital long QT syndrome, or QT interval >500 ms)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of sick sinus syndrome or high degree AV block
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a pacemaker, implantable cardioverter defibrillator or cardiac resynchronization therapy device
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diabetes mellitus or history of hypoglycemic episodes
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of bronchospasm or uncontrolled asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant (by history or serum test) or breast-feeding
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to safely withdraw from existing beta-blockers or ivabradine prior to the study day
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant use of class I and III antiarrhythmic agents, or non-dihydropyridine calcium channel blockers
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant use of strong cytochrome P450 3A4 (CYP 3A4) inhibitors
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe hepatic impairment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any contraindication to propranolol or ivabradine not specifically listed above as per the product monographs.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to give informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
